CustomField.description: Select this to enable submission comment 2 for this step. When enabled, the user will be prompted to enter submission comment 2 using the submission comment 2 label when the request is submitted for approval.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select this to enable submission comment 2 for this step. When enabled, the user will be prompted to enter submission comment 2 using the submission comment 2 label when the request is submitted for approval.
CustomField.label: Step Submission Comment 2 Enabled
